cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the Archive Compression Rule

dicomTransferSyntax.title: DICOM Transfer Syntax UID
dicomTransferSyntax.description: Transfer Syntax to which received images shall be compressed

dcmRulePriority.title: Rule Priority
dcmRulePriority.description: If the condition of several Compression rules matches for a received image, the rule with the highest priority will get applied. If there are several matching rules with equal priority it is undefined which rule get applied.

dcmProperty.title: Conditions
dcmProperty.description: Conditions in format (SendingHostname|SendingApplicationEntityTitle|ReceivingHostname|ReceivingApplicationEntityTitle|{AttributeTagOrKeyword[number]}|{SequenceTagOrKeyword.AttributeTagOrKeyword})[!]={regEx}. More than one value can be specified for a given attribute by separating them with a | symbol. Examples: SendingApplicationEntityTitle=FORWARD or Modality=MR|CT or ProcedureCodeSequence.CodeValue=MRProcedure or 00180015=KNEE or 00321034.00080100=RequestingServiceCode or ImageType[3]=LOCALIZER

dcmImageWriteParam.title: Image Write Param
dcmImageWriteParam.description: Image Write Parameter(s) (name=value) set at on Image Writer before compression

dcmCompressionDelay.title: Compression Delay
dcmCompressionDelay.description: Compression delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS. Compress on receive if absent.
